"""
Hello World!
"""


from snowflake.snowpark.session import Session
from snowflake.snowpark.functions import sproc, col, min, max, avg
from snowflake.snowpark import functions as F
from snowflake.snowpark.functions import concat, lit, col, lag, lead,lower,trim,upper
from snowflake.snowpark.window import Window
from snowflake.snowpark import types as T
import datetime as dt
import time
from snowflake.snowpark.types import StringType
from pathlib import Path
import configparser
import os

# To import modules from another directory into the current directory
import sys
root_dir = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent
sys.path.insert(0, root_dir.__str__())

# Internal imports
# import common.utils.definitions as df

print("Hello world!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")



[docs]def init_config():
    """
    This is a configparser

    Args:
        None

    Returns:
        Configparser object.
    """
    config = configparser.ConfigParser()

    parentFolderPath = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent
    config_file_path = os.path.join(parentFolderPath, 'common/utils', 'config.ini')

    config.read(config_file_path)

    return config



[docs]def gamingmachine_load_cdm_transformation(session,batchId,customerName):

    """
    Args:
        This do nothing

    Returns:
        Nothing
    """

    print("Initiated: CDM load from FM Curated/Sessions to gamingmachineDf table for FM Source")
    
    fm_curated_df = session.table("RAW.FM_CURATED").filter((F.col('customer') == customerName) 
                                                            & (F.col('batch_Id') == batchId)
                                                            & (F.col('sessionId').isNotNull())
                                                        )
    gamemachineDf = fm_curated_df.select(fm_curated_df.EGMID,fm_curated_df.AREAID,fm_curated_df.LOCATION, fm_curated_df.batch_id.alias('batch_Id')).distinct()
    
    venueDf = session.table('CDM.VENUE').select('VENUEID','CITY','VENUENAME')

    # To get the Venueid's from CDM.Venue table
    gamemachine_join = gamemachineDf.join(venueDf,(gamemachineDf.AREAID == venueDf.CITY) & (gamemachineDf.LOCATION == venueDf.VENUENAME),'left')\
                                    .drop(venueDf.CITY,venueDf.VENUENAME)

    gamemachine_cdm_df = gamemachine_join \
        .withColumn('VLTID', F.concat(F.lit('F_'),gamemachine_join.EGMID)) \
        .withColumn('VENDOR',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('EGMID',gamemachine_join.EGMID)\
        .withColumn('VENUEID',gamemachine_join.VENUEID)\
        .withColumn("batchid", F.lit(gamemachine_join.BATCH_ID))\
        .withColumn('SOURCE_CODE',lit(df.def_floor_manager_source_code))

    gamemachinefinalDf = gamemachine_cdm_df.drop(['batch_Id','AREAID','LOCATION'])
    gamemachinefinalDf = gamemachinefinalDf.dropDuplicates(['vltId', 'vendor', 'venueId','batchid' ,'source_code'])

    gamemachinefinalDf.write.mode('append').saveAsTable("CDM.gamingmachine")



[docs]def game_load_cdm_transformation(session, batchId, customerName):

    """
    Transform game data

    Args:
        Session, batch, customer

    Return:
        Game dataframe
    """

    print("Initiated: CDM load from FM Curated/Sessions to game table for FM Source")

    fm_curated_df = session.table("RAW.FM_CURATED").filter((F.col('customer') == customerName) 
                                                            & (F.col('batch_Id') == batchId)
                                                            & (F.col('sessionId').isNotNull())
                                                            & (F.col('rectype').isin(['pss','pse']))
                                                        )
    
    gameDf = fm_curated_df.select(fm_curated_df.THEMEID,fm_curated_df.THEMENAME.alias('THEMENAME'),fm_curated_df.PAYTABLE, fm_curated_df.batch_id.alias('batch_Id'))
    
    gameDf = gameDf.withColumn('gameTitle_case_insensitive',F.lower(F.trim(gameDf.THEMENAME)))
    
    gameDf = gameDf.dropDuplicates(['gameTitle_case_insensitive', 'themeId', 'paytable', 'batch_id'])

    gamefilterDf = gameDf.filter(col('THEMEID').isNotNull())

    # Removing G2S_None gameIds as G2S_None in each gameTitle might pollute the gameId based sessions
    #  finally ported to the Django tables as Datasets
    gamefilterDf = gamefilterDf.filter(F.lower(F.trim(col('THEMEID'))) != F.lower(F.trim(F.lit('G2S_none'))))

    game_cdm_df = gamefilterDf \
        .withColumn('SOURCE_CODE',lit(df.def_floor_manager_source_code)) \
        .withColumn("batchid", F.lit(gamefilterDf.BATCH_ID))\
        .withColumn('DATASETID',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('PAYTABLE',gamefilterDf.PAYTABLE)\
        .withColumn('GAMEVERSION',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('GAMETITLE',gamefilterDf.THEMENAME)\
        .withColumn('GAMEID',concat(F.lit('FM_'), gamefilterDf.themeId))

    gamefinalDf = game_cdm_df.drop(['THEMEID', 'batch_Id','THEMENAME','gameTitle_case_insensitive'])

    # Inserting only once for all batchIds as CDM.Game is sort of a Master data and it
    #  should not be duplicated per batchId, doing so creates skew in downstream processing
    gamefinalDf = gamefinalDf.dropDuplicates(['gameid', 'gametitle', 'gameversion', 'paytable', 'source_code']) \
                    .select('GAMEID','GAMETITLE','GAMEVERSION','PAYTABLE','DATASETID','BATCHID','SOURCE_CODE')

    print(gamefinalDf.filter(gamefinalDf.gametitle.isin('SolarDisc')).count())
    print(gamefinalDf.filter(gamefinalDf.gametitle.isin('Cleopatra II')).count())
    print(gamefinalDf.filter(gamefinalDf.gametitle.isin('PHARAOHS FORTUNE FG 15 LINE')).count())

    gamefinalDf.write.mode('append').saveAsTable("CDM.game")  

     


[docs]def venue_load_cdm_transformation(session,customerName, batchId):

    """
    Transform venue data

    Args:
        Session, batch, customer

    Return:
        Venue dataframe
    """


    print("Initiated: CDM load from FM Curated/Sessions to Venue table for FM Source")

    fm_curated_df = session.table("RAW.FM_CURATED").filter(col("AREAID").isNotNull()
                                                            & (F.col('customer') == customerName)
                                                            & (F.col('batch_Id') == batchId)
                                                            & (F.col('sessionId').isNotNull()))

    
    venueDf =  fm_curated_df.select(fm_curated_df.AREAID,fm_curated_df.LOCATION,fm_curated_df.CURRENCYID,fm_curated_df.BATCH_ID.alias('batch_Id')).distinct()


    venue_cdm_df = venueDf \
        .withColumn('venueId', concat(lit(venueDf.AREAID),concat(lit('_')),venueDf.LOCATION))\
        .withColumn('venueName',venueDf.LOCATION)\
        .withColumn('streetAddress',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('city',venueDf.AREAID)\
        .withColumn('postalcode',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('state',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('jurisdictionName',lit(None))\
        .withColumn('country',venueDf.CURRENCYID)\
        .withColumn("batchid", F.lit(venueDf.BATCH_ID))\
        .withColumn('source_code',lit(df.def_floor_manager_source_code))

    venuefinalDf = venue_cdm_df.drop(['batch_Id','areaid','location','currencyid'])

    venuefinalDf = venuefinalDf.dropDuplicates([ 'venueId','venueName','streetAddress', 'city', 'postalCode', 'state', 
                                                    'jurisdictionName', 'country', 'source_code'])
    venuefinalDf.write.mode('append').saveAsTable("CDM.venue")


    

[docs]def execute(customerName, batchId):

    """
    Loads the data to snowflake

    Args:
        customer, batchid

    Returns:
        None
    
    """
    if((customerName == None) | (customerName == '') | (batchId == None) | (batchId == '')):
        print('Invalid customer name or batchId')
        return

    exec_start_time = time.time()
    
    config = init_config()

    CONNECTION_PARAMETERS = {
        'account': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'account'),
        'user': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'user'),
        'password': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'password'),
        'schema': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'schema'),
        'database': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'database'),
        'warehouse': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'warehouse'),
        'role': config.get('snowflake_connection', 'role'),
    }

    session = Session.builder.configs(CONNECTION_PARAMETERS).create()

    print(session.sql('select current_warehouse(), current_database(), current_schema()').collect())

    game_load_cdm_transformation(session, batchId,customerName)

    venue_load_cdm_transformation(session,customerName,batchId)

    gamingmachine_load_cdm_transformation(session,batchId,customerName)

    exec_end_time = time.time()

    exec_total_time = exec_end_time - exec_start_time
    
    print("Total time taken: ", exec_total_time)

    session.close()  


if __name__ == "__main__":
    customerName = 'uil'
    batchId = 'f72fbf50-996b-45a4-b029-a477bf824c04'
    execute(customerName,batchId)
